DOC.brief_summary: This study prospective evaluation quality life men undergo robotic assist laparoscopic radical prostatectomy versus radical retropubic prostatectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Men Undergoing Robotic Assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy Versus Radical Retropubic Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Preoperatively , enrol patient complete questionnaire call EPIC ask urinary , sexual , bowel hormonal function At 1 , 3,6,9 12 month surgery , pateints complete questionnaire . All enrol Samsung Medical Center
DOC.criteria: Pathologic diagnosis prostate adenocarcinoma Clinical stage : AJCC ( VI ) stage T1T2 N0M0 Primary treatment Samsung Medical Center prostate cancer use : radical retropubic prostatectomy , robotic prostatectomy Clinical Stage : T3 , T4 , nodal distant metastasis All kind neoadjuvant , concurrent adjuvant treatment poor health force patient dropout
